title: A Spot Of Science
resume: Viewers ask their craziest science questions, then it’s up to Gus Sorola and Chris Demarais to match wits with evolutionary biologist Sally Le Page in search of an answer.  No science theory is too dumb, but someone on this panel probably is. (It's Chris.)
